title: Mon dieu! Wherefor art thou Minuscule?
content:
[http://www.tdc.org/news/2005Results/Minuscule.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128103351/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2005Results/Minuscule.html "http://www.tdc.org/news/2005Results/Minuscule.html")

Anyone know any information on how and when this family will be released? I am dying to  
play with it. Thank you in advance...

Best regards and well kerned high fives,  
Benknight

 [‹ Say goodbye to these fabulous painted letters.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128103351/http:/typophile.com/node/39266 "Go to previous forum topic") [TYPE BLOCK: photography + typography call for participants ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128103351/http:/typophile.com/node/38892 "Go to next forum topic")
author: benknight

comments.content: Thomas Huot-Marchand was planning to distribute Minuscule via [http://www.256tm.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128103351/http:/www.256tm.com/). “The end of summer” was last summer (2005). Any more recent news?

usage note: ’wherefor’ actually means ’why’.

Shakespeare was an early existentialist.

geo

Yes, your comment has been duly-noted on your time card.

...it looks like I scared eveyone away as well...

[http://www.256tm.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128103351/http:/www.256tm.com/ "http://www.256tm.com")

looks like it is finally here... I am psyched!!!
